all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Thus, none shall be exempted from the justice and the laws of God, that all things may be done in order and in solemnity before him, according to truth and righteousness.
Doctrine and Covenants 107:84
Quote of the Day
"When a woman and a man are in such a fragile time, … our words, our hands, our hearts—spiritually, emotionally, and financially—can bless them."
Elder Neil L. Andersen | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
